name: book-explorer
description: Full-stack Book Explorer application with web scraping, API backend, and modern frontend

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run scraper:watch"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run scraper
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../scraper && npm install
